description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nFrost Affinity:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FROZEN}. Your creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FROZEN} can still act and can {ACTION_cast} spells that interact with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FROZEN} without consuming {STAT_charges}. This trait does not stack.
name: Unmelting Ice
